name: Broken リアリティー [Wave Simulator]
name_original: Broken リアリティー [Wave Simulator]
description:
Wave Simulator is a interactive application made as part of the project "Broken リアリティー "(reality) , a videogame currently in development.

Controls:
Pick texture and pattern by clicking the buttons, rotate water with mouse drag.

http://brokenrealitygame.tumblr.com/

Credits:

Made by Galamot Shaku Twitter: @galamotshaku

Audio by Nestor Jaimen

Music by SHEATHS
